name: Hallways Of Unknown (ALPHA 0.01)
description:
This is a short game which is a loop. This game has a few puzzles and will receive updates from time to time

game does end only has 5 levels This game like said will be updated all the time and maybe having over 100+ levels meaning lots of enjoyment out of the player.

If you are wondering what the story of the game is, well its a looping game where you go out of your room to head to work, and end up finding some mutant in your house. Which tries to scare you.
there is no ending to this game at the moment but more is coming soon.

You pick up a key which works on the door. you walk down a vast hallway confused upon what's happening you end up getting to the end and your phone rings, so you go to pick it up...

It all happens over again...
